title: Luxury Brand New House for Sale in Kurunegala
details: Architect Designed brand new luxury house for sale at Dambokka, Kurunegala. This solidly built house built on 30 Perches well well maintained Land area and approx.3,900 Sq.Ft floor area. Just 500 m to Colombo – Kurunegala A6 main road. About 1 Km to Northen Central Highway Boyagane Interchange. 3 Km to Central Expressway Bawilgamuwa Interchange. Less than 5 Km to Kurunegala Town.
